Description: Ticketing Website - C#, ASP.NET, Bootstrap, MySQL
Position: Made using the above technologies, works as a standard ticketing system, anyone who has logged in can view all tickets, delete them, complete them, and add to them. Updates the MySQL database using SQL commands, has user management.

Made using the above technologies, allows one to record their current condition in a database, then view it later in a graph. Also allows for filtering for different time periods. Has User login and sign up to keep data seperated between users.

Designed the Operating System funcctionality of an educational operating system using C, gained knowledge and practical experience with file tables, physical memory, allocating/deallocating memory with virtual memory, etc.

Description: CPEN 291 Note Transcriber - React Native, Flask, Circuit Python, Python
Position: Designed a simple device that transcribes handwritten notes or online images into a text file or pdf. The device can be controlled by a web app, which manipulates hardware to flip pages and take photos, by interacting with API endpoints.

Position: Designed a simple device that transcribes handwritten notes or online images into a text file or pdf. The device can be controlled by a web app, which manipulates hardware to flip pages and take photos, by interacting with API endpoints.

Description: Focus Practice Timer - JS, CSS, HTML
Position: A simple JS, HTML, and CSS app that shows a basic stopwatch on screen. However, every second there's a chance that it will increase 2 seconds instead of 1, and the user has to click Found to say they found the jump. The time(s) taken to find the jump is displayed in milliseconds.

Description: Care Connect App - Embedded JS, Tailwind CSS, ChatGPT API, etc.
Position: Set up an app using Tailwind CSS, and Embedded JS for API endpoints to react with Hackathon technologies and ChatGPT API. Designed the app in Figma and worked with a group to finished it and a presentation within 2 days.
